title: Friendly & Customer Service ChatBot
desc: This Chatbot can store your data in a file then it will be respond you according to that data also he is able to learn more words or things you want.

title: Hotel Reservation System
desc: You can reserve a hotel and it will be sent an email to reservation department of hotel. If you want to make some changes you can do this, there should date available for changes.

title: Hospital Management System
desc: In HMS, you can add patient's information and access anytime and can change the information whenever you want. All the information should be stored in json file.
